resources.string: A little extra to help bring this project to life.
A monthly pep talk to boost your creative practice, for creators of all types.
A project is infringing on your copyright or trademark.
A successfully funded project will collect your pledge in its native currency. The amounts shown are approximate.
A weekly mix of handpicked projects, plus occasional Kickstarter news
A weekly roundup of the best and brightest projects on Kickstarter, handpicked by our team.
Address confirmed! Need to change your address before it locks? Visit your backing details on our website.
After September 5, 2023, this Dashboard feature will only be available on our website.
The amounts shown are an approximate conversion. If the project is successful, your pledge will be collected in the native currency of the project, which is also displayed.
Any payment methods you\'ve saved to Kickstarter are listed here (securely) for your convenience.

Authentication success. Please pull to refresh.
Back it because you believe in it.
Backer has pledged to this project.
Backers have signed up to help Kickstarter creators bring their ideas to life.
Backing means supporting a creative project, regardless of the outcome.
Become a backer to leave a comment.
Big Kickstarter news and events near you, delivered just a few times a year.
Big Kickstarter news, plus occasional projects and events chosen just for you.
Your request did not go through. Try again.
This user has been successfully blocked

Blocking this user means that you won’t see their comments or content anymore. If you have saved or backed projects from this user, you must remove your pledge before blocking. To unblock a user in the future, please go through our Help Center.
By creating an account, you agree to Kickstarter’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
By pledging, you acknowledge that rewards or reimbursements aren’t guaranteed by either Kickstarter or the creator.
By pledging you agree to Kickstarter\'s Terms of Use, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy.

By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy. Our policies explain how we use your data to deliver, improve, and promote our service and our site, and how you can exercise your rights to control that use.
By signing up, you’ll log in to Kickstarter using your Facebook account. If you prefer not to use Facebook, restart this app and choose another option.
By submitting your pledge, you agree that our payment processor, Stripe, may charge your payment method.
Change your shipping location or skip add-ons to continue.
Check back later for an update on your export progress.
Check out these handpicked projects just for you.
Check your inbox to complete this simple step.
Connect with Facebook to follow friends and get notified when they back or launch projects.
Content isn\'t loading right now.\n Please tap to retry.
Couldn\'t load more comments.\n Tap to retry
Couldn‘t open live stream. Try again later.
After %{expiration_date}, the Dashboard and Post Update features will only be available on our website.
%{creator_name} needs some information to deliver your reward for %{project_name}.
%{creator_name} will be streaming live on Kickstarter %{in_duration}
Creators must be transparent and honest in documenting their prototype. Photorealistic renderings are not permitted.
Customize your reward with optional add-ons.
Data will appear here once somebody backs your project.
Discover innovative projects and ideas, handpicked twice a month by Kickstarter\'s Design & Tech team.
Discover the future of Design and Tech.
Do you have the consent of the owners of the works that were (or will be) used to produce the AI-generated portion of your projects? Please explain.
Either the pledge or the project was canceled before the deadline.
Email must be a valid email address.
Ex: Posting obscene or hateful comments, doxxing or posting personal information in comments or updates.
Ex: Using email lists from outside sources, promoting a project where it shouldn\'t be promoted, link bombing.
Explore and support the latest creative ideas created by our vast global community.

If you login with Facebook, we’ll import your name and profile photo. We\'ll also access your friend list so you can follow your Facebook friends on Kickstarter. We will never post anything on Facebook without your permission.
By logging in with Facebook, we’ll import your name, profile photo and friend list.
Your account was disconnected for your security. By logging in with Facebook, we’ll import your name, profile photo and friend list.
Failed to retrieve live stream event details

Filter by projects recommended for you
Filters by projects with upcoming and past live streams.
Find projects that speak to you ▸
Find projects you’ll love and help bring creative ideas to life.
Find projects you’ll love in art, design, film, games, music, and more. Once you back a project, you’ll see all your activity here.
Follow your Facebook friends and get notified when they back or launch projects.
Follow your Facebook friends and keep up with the projects they back and launch.
Following must be on to find Facebook friends. Change your account privacy settings to enable this feature.
For the database or source that I will use or will create, the consent of the persons whose works or information are incorporated has been or will be obtained.
Sign up to receive a biweekly mix of new projects and updates on all things games, handpicked by Kickstarter\'s Games team.
Get notified about this creator’s live streams
Get notified when your friends back and launch projects
Got it! Your changes have been saved.
Got it! Your survey response has been submitted.
Sign up to receive a mix of new projects, compelling stories, and visual inspiration, delivered once (and sometimes twice) a week.
Help local businesses keep the lights on during COVID-19 closures.
I am incorporating AI in my project in another way.
I plan to use AI-generated content in my project.

If the project reaches its funding goal, the first charge of %{amount} will be collected on %{project_deadline}.
If the project reaches its funding goal, you will be charged on %{project_deadline}.
If the project reaches its funding goal, you will be charged %{total} on %{project_deadline}.

If the project reaches its funding goal, you will be charged %{total} on %{project_deadline}. You will receive a proof of pledge that will be redeemable if the project is funded and the creator is successful at completing the creative venture.
If you turn following off, you won\'t be able to follow anyone and no one will be able to follow you. Your profile will be disconnected from all of your followers.
If your profile is private, others can see your name and picture.
If your profile is not private, others can also see the projects you\'ve backed, your location, bio and websites.
If your project reaches its funding goal, the backer will be charged on %{project_deadline}.
If your project reaches its funding goal, the backer will be charged %{total} on %{project_deadline}.
It looks like you\'ve already reported this project to us. Our Trust and Safety team will screen your report against Our Rules and Community Guidelines. Thanks for your feedback.
It may not offer some or all of your add-ons.

It may take up to 24 hours to collect your data. When it’s ready, we’ll send instructions to download your data to the email associated with this account. If you don’t hear from us, come back here to try again.
It\'s a way to bring creative projects to life.
It\'s a way to bring creative projects to life. Learn more about accountability
It\'s like the radio but nothing sucks and also it\'s a newsletter.
It\'s our birthday! More than 160,000 creative projects have come to life on Kickstarter over the past decade, with support from over 16,000,000 backers.
Keep in touch after your campaign and plan your next project.
Keep up with future live streams
Kickstarter is not a store. It\'s a way to bring creative projects to life.

Kickstarter is not a store. It\'s a way to bring creative projects to life.
Learn more about accountability

Kickstarter takes claims of intellectual property infringement seriously. For more information and instructions on how to report infringement, please visit our Copyright Policy and our Trademark Policy. Only claims filed by the copyright or trademark holder can be processed.
Know when creators and backers message you by enabling notifications.
Learn about AI policy on Kickstarter

Our Community Guidelines prohibit spam and abusive behavior by both creators and backers.
Your password must be at least 6 characters long.

Please enter an amount of %{amount} or more.

Pledge to your favorites, then view all the projects you’ve backed here.
Kickstarter profiles are private by default. To make your profile public and visible to the world, turn this off.
Project creators and their collaborators cannot misrepresent themselves, the involvement of third parties, or their project’s level of support.
Project goal and pledge amounts will be shown in approximate conversions. A successfully funded project will collect your pledge in its native currency.
Projects cannot plagiarize, offer items that aren\'t produced by the creator, or repackage a previously-created product without adding anything new.
Projects may not offer items mentioned in our prohibited items list.
Projects on Kickstarter must create something to share with others.
Rate us in the App Store
Receive a reminder 48 hours before this and any other saved project ends by enabling notifications.
Receive a weekly mix of handpicked projects, plus occasional Kickstarter news.
Receive project updates and more by enabling notifications.
Receive project updates, messages, and more by enabling notifications.

Show up for the spaces you love

Something went wrong, please try again.

Tap the heart icon on a project to get notified 48 hours before it ends.
Tap the heart on each project page to save it. We’ll remind you 48 hours before the project ends.
Tap the star icon on a project to get notified 48 hours before it ends.
Tap the star on each project page to save it. We’ll remind you 48 hours before the project ends.
Thank you for supporting this project.
Thanks for being part of all the joy, hard work, and hope that’s gone into it—and cheers to what’s ahead.
Thanks for bringing this project one step closer to becoming a reality.
Thanks—you’ve successfully verified your email address.
The backer canceled their pledge for this project.
The creator canceled this project, so your payment method was never charged.
The email associated with this Facebook account is already registered to another Kickstarter user.
The first charge will occur when the project ends successfully, then every 2 weeks until fully paid. When this option is selected no further edits can be made to your pledge.

The owners of these works are or will be receiving credit for their work.

This allows you to see project goal and pledge amounts in your preferred currency.

This Facebook account is already linked to another Kickstarter user.
This holiday season, support a project for no reward, just because it speaks to you.
This is meant to give you an idea of what shipping might cost. Once the creator is ready to fulfill your reward, you’ll return to pay shipping and applicable taxes.
This may involve submitting a delivery address, selecting your item preferences, answering survey questions, and/or paying for shipping or taxes.

to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.

View and manage your backings from our new Backings dashboard! More functionality will become available as our beta evolves.
We are unable to authenticate your payment method. Please pull to refresh and choose a different payment method.
We can no longer log you in through Facebook. Please log in with your Kickstarter password, or set a new password with your Facebook email.
We can’t process this pledge because of a problem with the backer’s payment method.
We can’t process your Pledge Over Time payment. Please view your pledge on a web browser and log in to fix your payment.
We can’t process your pledge. Please update your payment method.
We can\'t process your pledge for:
We can’t process your pledge. Visit the Project Alerts dashboard to authenticate your card.
We collected the backer’s pledge for this project.
We collected your pledge for this project.
We don’t allow cancelations that will cause a project to fall short of its goal within the last 24 hours.
We\'re processing this pledge—pull to refresh.
We\'re processing your pledge—pull to refresh.
We’re simplifying our login process. To access your Kickstarter account, enter the email associated to your Facebook account and we’ll send you a link to set a password
We think you’ll like these, too
We use personal data to provide a good experience on Kickstarter, and to help connect you with projects you\'ll love.
We use your activity internally to make recommendations for you. Turn recommendations off to opt out of this.
We\'ve been unable to send email to this address. Please make sure it is typed correctly.
We were unable to connect to the live stream chat.
We were unable to load the shipping destinations.\n Please try again later.
We will be discontinuing the ability to log in via Facebook. To log in to your account using the email %{email}, please set a password that’s at least 6 characters long.
We’ll email you when this project launches so you can be one of the first backers.
We won’t share this with the creator.
Welcome to our library. Peruse the stacks with us.
We\'ll ask you to sign back into the Kickstarter app once you\'ve changed your password.
We\'ll help you find a project to back.
We\'ll import your name and profile photo, and access your friend list. We\'ll never post anything without your permission.
We’ll remind you 48 hours before this project ends, and you\'ll get a reminder about all projects you save moving forward. To view everything you’ve saved, visit your profile.
What parts of your project will use AI-generated content? Please be as specific as possible.
When following is on, you can follow the activity of others and others can follow your activity. Turn following off to permanently delete this data.
When projects you\'ve backed have successfully funded, you\'ll see them here.
When projects you’ve backed need your attention, you’ll see them here.

You need to pledge at least %{reward_minimum} for this reward.
You will be charged for your pledge over four payments, at no extra cost.
The first charge will be 24 hours after the project ends successfully, then every 2 weeks until fully paid. When this option is selected no further edits can be made to your pledge.
